com.prosthetics
Class PatientDBHelper

java.lang.Object
  SQLiteOpenHelper
      com.prosthetics.PatientDBHelper

public class PatientDBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

This class is a helper class for opening and creating the patient db. It should be used in conjunction with PatientDB helper class.

See Also:
LocationsDB
